message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can make this work!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $140, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $130. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
